author: jdcasey
msg: updating ASF parent POM to include source-release assembly configuration, with configurable descriptorRef (using expression ${sourceReleaseAssemblyDescriptor}). Also, adding comments in the Maven parent POM to remove this source-release configuration once the parent version is upgraded to 7."

msg: Resolve additional selection issues in TextArea.

author: slaws
msg: Fix motivated by ASM-5023. Update code to reflect the OASIS treatment of promoted references. Endpoint references are now copied down to the promoted component reference and the multiplicity validation is performed there. The change works now but the code needs tidying. I've left some things commented out that I'll now remove.
